title: About
body:
# Hello, my name is Clark Bachelot and I am a designer that focuses on building scalable, reusable design patterns that make great experiences for my fellow humans.

I am a designer by trade that is on a personal mission to bridge the gap between design and development. I always try to push myself to learn something new so that I can better understand how to work with people with different skill sets.

Throughout my career I have been a Designer, Front -End Developer, and Digital Product Manager but regardless of title I always consider myself a professional learner.
